text: this is the aftermath of last night's
attack on this interior ministry
compound here in Mario Pole the
officials here say that the attack by
pro-russian protesters started at about
eight o'clock in the evening we're told
that it got violent at about ten o'clock
in the evening this is one of the
Interior Ministry jeeps which was
damaged and almost entirely smashed up
in fact if you look over here there's
this guy with a clipboard he's one of
the officials and noting the damage and
this lady has been going around with
these numbers pointing out the damage
here essentially last night the
protesters managed to get to the gates
you might be able to see look these are
the gates which were smashed in they
even managed to get a bit further than
that we're told that about ten o'clock
in the evening the Ukrainian interior
ministry forces started fighting back
that battle went on till about one
o'clock in the morning the Ukrainian
Interior Ministry says that a number of
people were injured number the attackers
were injured and really what you see
here gives evidence of the difficulty
faced by the Ukrainian authorities here
in eastern Ukraine they want to try to
take back the building's they've lost to
pro-russian forces they haven't been
able to do so and now they're having to
spend most of their time defending their
own faces
